descriptions.title: Download Pinterest videos online for free
descriptions.main_desc: {site_name} is a powerful Pinterest video downloader that allows you to save Pinterest videos, images, and Pins in HD quality. Whether you want to download videos from Pinterest boards or individual Pins, our tool makes it simple and fast. No software installation required - just paste the URL and download instantly.
descriptions.how_to_subtitle: Follow these simple steps to download any Pinterest video or Pin.
descriptions.step1_desc: Go to Pinterest and find the video Pin you want to download. Click on the share button and select 'Copy link'.
descriptions.step2_desc: Come back to {site_name} and paste the Pinterest video URL into the input field above.
descriptions.step3_desc: Click the Download button and choose your preferred quality. The video will be saved to your device.
descriptions.note: Note: {site_name} respects Pinterest's terms of service and content creators' rights. Please download videos only for personal use and always credit the original creators.

faq_section.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq_section.q1: Can I download videos from private Pinterest boards?
faq_section.a1: You can only download Pins that are publicly accessible. Private board content requires appropriate permissions.
faq_section.a2: We support MP4 video format which works on all devices. You can also download images in JPEG and PNG formats.
faq_section.q3: Is there a limit on downloads?
faq_section.a3: No, there are no limits. You can download unlimited Pinterest videos and images for free.
faq_section.q4: Can I download entire Pinterest boards?
faq_section.a4: Currently, you need to download Pins individually by pasting each Pin's URL.
faq_section.q5: Why can't I download some Pins?
faq_section.a5: Some Pins may be restricted by privacy settings or may not contain downloadable video content.

faq.q2: Can I download HD Pinterest videos?
